root.name: Microscope Advanced Acquisition
root.author: tprovoost - Thomas Provoost
root.changelog:
- Version 1.3.2.0 Date 2014-07-15 11:35:00
Minors fixes, tweak and refactoring.
- Version 1.3.1.0 Date 2014-07-10 14:08:21
* Reverted to MicroManager main class name. * some tweaks / fixes.
- Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2014-07-03 23:01:51
Complete rewrite for the new MicroManager plugin.
- Version 1.2.1.0 Date 2013-04-12 14:55:41
* corected clojure was not found issue.
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2013-04-09 17:48:19
* Now fully uses the Acquisition Engine of Micro-Manager 1.4.14.
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2013-01-25 16:39:01
* changed signature of functions, upload needed
- Version 1.0.2.3 Date 2013-01-11 16:01:02
* Updated to 1.3.0.0
- Version 1.0.2.2 Date 2012-05-31 11:52:29
Updated to last version to prevent issues with Autofocus Manager.
- Version 1.0.2.1 Date 2012-05-22 18:14:10
- Version 1.0.2.0 Date 2012-05-22 17:57:27
Updated to last Micro-Manager version. This plugin may disappear in a near future for a more intuitive and graphical version.
- Version 1.0.1.2 Date 2012-03-05 14:12:54
Updated to last MM version.
- Version 1.0.1.1 Date 2011-11-16 13:18:20
- Version 1.0.1.0 Date 2011-11-09 17:29:19
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2011-09-22 16:28:35
